overview: On her way home, Zohreh senses that someone 's chasing her. As she attempts to escape, she gets hit by a car and dies. Parviz, Zohre 's husband , releases from jail on bail (provided by the warden) for the first time in six years. He's given 3 days to bury Zohreh and attends her funeral, but has another concern about Zohreh.
title: Isolation
